title: Random Question about sales..
body: I missed the halloween sale by a day, my pay day was today and i would have really liked to grab the nidalee skin. I'm wondering if it would be at anyway possible to get that skin(opening a ticket or something) or if i'm SOL til next year?

replies.body: We're not able to extend sales, so I'm not sure we would be able to assist here.  I totally understand your situation, though, and we do like to look at each case individually.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look and find some options individually.
